item.title: !read me!317 private server help?!read me!
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

here is how u autospawn, keep in mind use tab after u have put npcid instead of spaces or it will not work, well not for me anyways

spawn = [npcid] [xcoord] [ycoord] 0 0 0 0 0 1

the 4 0s before the 1 r the coords in which the npc will move, xcoord and y coord r where the npc will spawn

now for shops

find the id of a shop keeper and auto spawn him in autospawn.cfg

open client.java and search for wanneshop, when u have found them add this code
}
if(NPCID == 569){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 8;

the npcid must be the same as it is in autospawn.cfg and cannot be being used already.

To add items to your shop go into your shops.cfg file, mines in config folder dont know bout urs and under all the codes add 1 like this : shop = 26 Skillcape_Shop 2 2 4319 1 4359 1
make sure the shop id, aka 26, is the same number as ur wanneshop in client.java, skillcape shop is name of shop, the 2s i belive stand for selling and buying items from shop, the 4319 is item id and 1 is item amount, again make sure u use tab. sorry for bad explanations but im bad at explaning stuff:s hope this helps

Read full topic
